languages.text: "Молчание станции в ответ на бортовые запросы уже было подозрительным. После слов магоса на душе легче не стало. Держите руки поближе к оружию".
"The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."
languages.original_text: "Молчание станции в ответ на бортовые запросы уже было подозрительным. После слов магоса на душе легче не стало. Держите руки поближе к оружию".

traits.locale_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."
"The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."
"The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."
"The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

languages.text: “这座星站没有回应我们的呼叫，这已经很可疑了。听了贤者的话，我心中恐怕变得更加不安了。握紧武器。”
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: “这座星站没有回应我们的呼叫，这已经很可疑了。听了贤者的话，我心中恐怕变得更加不安了。握紧武器。”

languages.text: «La ausencia de respuesta de la estación ya era sospechosa, y las palabras del magos no me inspiran ninguna confianza. Preparen las armas».
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: «La ausencia de respuesta de la estación ya era sospechosa, y las palabras del magos no me inspiran ninguna confianza. Preparen las armas».

languages.text: 「我らの船の呼びかけにステーションが応答しない時点で、事態は疑わしいものだった。マゴスの言葉を聞いた後では、もはや余地もなかろう。武器を持て」
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: 「我らの船の呼びかけにステーションが応答しない時点で、事態は疑わしいものだった。マゴスの言葉を聞いた後では、もはや余地もなかろう。武器を持て」

languages.text: "Dass die Station nicht auf die Grüße unseres Schiffes reagiert hat, war bereits verdächtig. Und auch die Worte des Magos haben mich keineswegs beruhigt. Hände an die Waffen."
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: "Dass die Station nicht auf die Grüße unseres Schiffes reagiert hat, war bereits verdächtig. Und auch die Worte des Magos haben mich keineswegs beruhigt. Hände an die Waffen."

languages.text: « L'absence de réponse de la station à nos appels était déjà suspecte, mais les paroles du magos ne font que renforcer mon malaise. Tenez-vous prêts. »
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: « L'absence de réponse de la station à nos appels était déjà suspecte, mais les paroles du magos ne font que renforcer mon malaise. Tenez-vous prêts. »

languages.text: "İstasyonun gemimizin çağrılarını yanıtsız bırakması zaten şüphe uyandırıcıydı. Magos'un söylediklerinin de içimi rahatlattığını söyleyemem. Silahlarınızı hazırda bulundurun."
languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonun gemimizin çağrılarını yanıtsız bırakması zaten şüphe uyandırıcıydı. Magos'un söylediklerinin de içimi rahatlattığını söyleyemem. Silahlarınızı hazırda bulundurun."

languages.original_text: "The station's lack of response to our ship's hails was already suspicious. I am no less uneasy after the Magos's words. Hands at your weapons."
